entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Nordegg
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
